It turns out- what we need to battle is not just these viruses but also what‚Äôs often described as the ‚Äúcycle of panic and neglect‚Äù.

We have & will continue to have so much work to recover from this pandemic. And survive it.

But I hope we remember the lessons from this one.

The investments that we make in combatting these viruses will build resilience for the future. That‚Äôs why organizations like @CEPIvaccines have already funded work on this.
